description.author: Salesforce
text: Component that serves as a container for dynamically loaded sub-components that can be interacted with, including a view component and a list of left-rail view components. It supports actions such as navigating back and opening subviews.

elements.name: railPanelTopicSuite
elements.description: Represents the list of left-rail view topic suite that are conditionally rendered.

elements.name: dynamicViewComponent
elements.description: Represents the dynamic view component that is loaded based on certain conditions.
